description: Delete a time card time change.
permissions: Admins may delete time card time changes; non-admins may delete them only if they are allowed to create a time card approval for the related time card (per TimeCardApprovalPolicy#create?), and only while the change is unprocessed.
side_effects: Deletes a time card time change record.
validation_notes: Requires a time card time change ID argument. --confirm is required. Only unprocessed time card time changes can be deleted.
